org.sindice.siren.search.node

Class NodeBooleanQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.sindice.siren.search.node.NodeQuery
        • org.sindice.siren.search.node.NodeBooleanQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class NodeBooleanQuery
extends NodeQuery
    A NodeQuery that matches a boolean combination of primitive queries, e.g., NodeTermQuerys, NodePhraseQuerys, NodeBooleanQuerys, ...

    Code taken from BooleanQuery and adapted for the Siren use case.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NodeBooleanQuery.NodeBooleanWeight
      Expert: the Weight for NodeBooleanQuery, used to normalize, score and explain these queries.
      static class  NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses
      Thrown when an attempt is made to add more than getMaxClauseCount() clauses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeBooleanQuery

        public NodeBooleanQuery()
        Constructs an empty boolean query.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxClauseCount

        public static int getMaxClauseCount()
        Return the maximum number of clauses permitted, 1024 by default. Attempts to add more than the permitted number of clauses cause NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses to be thrown.
        See Also:
        setMaxClauseCount(int)

      • setMaxClauseCount

        public static void setMaxClauseCount(int maxClauseCount)
        Set the maximum number of clauses permitted per BooleanQuery. Default value is 1024.

      • setLevelConstraint

        public void setLevelConstraint(int levelConstraint)
        Description copied from class: NodeQuery
        Set a constraint on the node's level

        Given that the root of the tree (level 0) is the document id, the node level constraint ranges from 1 to Integer.MAX_VALUE. A node level constraint of 0 will always return false.

        Overrides:
        setLevelConstraint in class NodeQuery

      • setNodeConstraint

        public void setNodeConstraint(int lowerBound,
                     int upperBound)
        Description copied from class: NodeQuery
        Set an index interval constraint for a node. These constraints are inclusives.
        Overrides:
        setNodeConstraint in class NodeQuery

      • setAncestorPointer

        protected void setAncestorPointer(NodeQuery ancestor)
        Description copied from class: NodeQuery
        Expert: Add a pointer to the node query ancestor

        The pointer to node query ancestor is used to retrieve node constraints from ancestors.

        Overrides:
        setAncestorPointer in class NodeQuery

      • add

        public void add(NodeQuery query,
       NodeBooleanClause.Occur occur)
        Adds a clause to a boolean query.
        Throws:
        NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses - if the new number of clauses exceeds the maximum clause number
        See Also:
        getMaxClauseCount()

      • iterator

        public final Iterator<NodeBooleanClause> iterator()
        Returns an iterator on the clauses in this query. It implements the Iterable interface to make it possible to do: 
        for (SirenBooleanClause clause : booleanQuery) {}
